body_html: The compilation error in vfixup_* functions is because gcc doesn't recognize the int argument as a compile-time constant. You may try to make the argument constexpr int, if it doesn't work, the only option is to replace these functions with macros.
body_text: The compilation error in vfixup_* functions is because gcc doesn't recognize the int argument as a compile-time constant. You may try to make the argument constexpr int, if it doesn't work, the only option is to replace these functions with macros.
body: The compilation error in `vfixup_*` functions is because gcc doesn't recognize the int argument as a compile-time constant. You may try to make the argument `constexpr int`, if it doesn't work, the only option is to replace these functions with macros.
